document.full_text: paul splittorff, who won more games than any other kansas city royals pitcher, died of complications from skin and oral cancer wednesday, the american league club said. he was 64.
document.title: former royals pitcher splittorff dies at 64
lines_and_colors: paul splittorff, who won more games than any other kansas city royals pitcher, died of complications from skin and oral cancer wednesday, the american league club said. he was 64.
